page.title: 02SHOPS
page.content: There are two{hairdressers}in the village,Mrs.Richardson and Mrs. Phillips,Mrs.Richardson's shop is in her mother's house and Mrs.Phillip's shop is near the doctors.Mrs.Phillips works six or seven hours a day and Mrs.Richardson works eight. The Texaco{garage}is owned by Mrs. Lawn and Mrs.Swales and Battersbys is Mr.Lund's property.They sell petrol, sweets,batteries,car appliances,toys etc. Mr.Stoker's{farmshop}is on the main street.It sells meat,vegetables,sweets drinks,frozen foods and crisps. Normally three people work in the {Post Office.The shop opens at 9am. until 5.30pm.five days a week.It sells groceries,ice cream,sweets,pop,meat, cigarettes,crisps etc.
